text: 5. Let F = I—2uu” with vector u such that ||u/|z = 1. Determine whether each of the following statements is true or false. There is no need to justify your answer. 2 (a) F is symmetric (b) F is symmetric positive definite (¢) F is an orthogonal matrix (d) F is an orthogonal projector (e) F is nonsingular
